title: One Piece: Episode 104 Review
author: PhantomJ
description: A detailed review praising Episode 104 as 'truly a great one, and probably one of the best I've seen so far.' The reviewer highlights the emotional confrontation between Luffy and Vivi and notes improved pacing after filler episodes.

title: I'VE NEVER SEEN ONE PIECE Episodes 103 & 104 | Luffy vs. Vivi Plus Dream Soccer King!
author: The Phazecast (Joe and Eric)
description: A podcast episode where Joe (caught up on One Piece) and Eric (watching for the first time) discuss episodes 103 and 104, covering Crocodile's preparations and Luffy punching Vivi in the face during their confrontation.

title: 104: 'Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line!'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A first-time viewer's reaction to Episode 104, giving it five stars while expressing some confusion about how Luffy's solution addresses the political problems in Arabasta.

title: One Piece Episode 104-105 Reaction/Review
author: SprinkleVerse
description: A Patreon-exclusive reaction and review video covering episodes 104-105, discussing the unexpected Luffy vs Vivi confrontation.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 101-104 REACTION/REVIEW
author: Raph and Angy
description: A Patreon-exclusive reaction covering episodes 101-104 of One Piece.
